title: Changing recovery questions?
body:
Is there anyway to change your recovery questions? It's been a very long time since I made this account (2009) So to be honest I don't remember what questions I chose or even the answers I used with them and I wouldn't want to lose my account because I don't know them. 

There is only a small chance I would remember my answers if I knew the questions. Cause questions like (Whats your favorite color), the answer for that can change over time.

So in short, can I change my recovery questions?

PS: I never got the king rammus skin, which if I remember correctly was for voting for some game of the year.

replies.body: The account recovery questions aren't chosen by yourself but picked in a way so that only the original account creator could remember them. You don't need to answer every single one, just do your best to answer as many as you can and those agents with work with you in getting you back on the Rift.
